}{

}{

}{

\ottpremise{\ottnt{n_{{\mathrm{1}}}} \, \ottsym{-} \, \ottnt{n_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \ottsym{=}  \ottnt{n}}%
}{
 \langle  \ottnt{n_{{\mathrm{1}}}} \, \ottsym{-} \, \ottnt{n_{{\mathrm{2}}}} ,  \ottnt{s}  \rangle  \rightarrow  \langle  \ottnt{n} ,  \ottnt{s}  \rangle }{%
{\ottdrulename{OpSub}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleOpMult}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\ottnt{n_{{\mathrm{1}}}} \, \ottsym{*} \, \ottnt{n_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \ottsym{=}  \ottnt{n}}%
}{
 \langle  \ottnt{n_{{\mathrm{1}}}} \, \ottsym{*} \, \ottnt{n_{{\mathrm{2}}}} ,  \ottnt{s}  \rangle  \rightarrow  \langle  \ottnt{n} ,  \ottnt{s}  \rangle }{%
{\ottdrulename{OpMult}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleOpDiv}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\ottnt{n_{{\mathrm{1}}}} \, \ottsym{/} \, \ottnt{n_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \ottsym{=}  \ottnt{n}}%
}{
 \langle  \ottnt{n_{{\mathrm{1}}}} \, \ottsym{/} \, \ottnt{n_{{\mathrm{2}}}} ,  \ottnt{s}  \rangle  \rightarrow  \langle  \ottnt{n} ,  \ottnt{s}  \rangle }{%
{\ottdrulename{OpDiv}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleOpMod}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\ottnt{n_{{\mathrm{1}}}} \, \ottsym{\%} \, \ottnt{n_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \ottsym{=}  \ottnt{n}}%
}{
 \langle  \ottnt{n_{{\mathrm{1}}}} \, \ottsym{\%} \, \ottnt{n_{{\mathrm{2}}}} ,  \ottnt{s}  \rangle  \rightarrow  \langle  \ottnt{n} ,  \ottnt{s}  \rangle }{%
{\ottdrulename{OpMod}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleOpOr}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\ottnt{b_{{\mathrm{1}}}} \, \ottsym{\mbox{$\mid$}\mbox{$\mid$}} \, \ottnt{b_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \ottsym{=}  \ottnt{b}}%
}{
 \langle  \ottnt{b_{{\mathrm{1}}}} \, \ottsym{\mbox{$\mid$}\mbox{$\mid$}} \, \ottnt{b_{{\mathrm{2}}}} ,  \ottnt{s}  \rangle  \rightarrow  \langle  \ottnt{b} ,  \ottnt{s}  \rangle }{%
{\ottdrulename{OpOr}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleOpAnd}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\ottnt{b_{{\mathrm{1}}}} \, \ottsym{\&\&} \, \ottnt{b_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \ottsym{=}  \ottnt{b}}%
}{
 \langle  \ottnt{b_{{\mathrm{1}}}} \, \ottsym{\&\&} \, \ottnt{b_{{\mathrm{2}}}} ,  \ottnt{s}  \rangle  \rightarrow  \langle  \ottnt{b} ,  \ottnt{s}  \rangle }{%
{\ottdrulename{OpAnd}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleOpEqEq}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\ottnt{v_{{\mathrm{1}}}} \, \ottsym{==} \, \ottnt{v_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \ottsym{=}  \ottnt{b}}%
}{
 \langle  \ottnt{v_{{\mathrm{1}}}} \, \ottsym{==} \, \ottnt{v_{{\mathrm{2}}}} ,  \ottnt{s}  \rangle  \rightarrow  \langle  \ottnt{b} ,  \ottnt{s}  \rangle }{%
{\ottdrulename{OpEqEq}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleOpNEq}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\ottnt{v_{{\mathrm{1}}}} \,  !\!\!=  \, \ottnt{v_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \ottsym{=}  \ottnt{b}}%
}{
 \langle  \ottnt{v_{{\mathrm{1}}}} \,  !\!\!=  \, \ottnt{v_{{\mathrm{2}}}} ,  \ottnt{s}  \rangle  \rightarrow  \langle  \ottnt{b} ,  \ottnt{s}  \rangle }{%
{\ottdrulename{OpNEq}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleOpEqEqEq}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\ottnt{v_{{\mathrm{1}}}} \, \ottsym{===} \, \ottnt{v_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \ottsym{=}  \ottnt{b}}%
}{
 \langle  \ottnt{v_{{\mathrm{1}}}} \, \ottsym{===} \, \ottnt{v_{{\mathrm{2}}}} ,  \ottnt{s}  \rangle  \rightarrow  \langle  \ottnt{b} ,  \ottnt{s}  \rangle }{%
{\ottdrulename{OpEqEqEq}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleOpNEqEq}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\ottnt{v_{{\mathrm{1}}}} \,  !\!\!==  \, \ottnt{v_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \ottsym{=}  \ottnt{b}}%
}{
 \langle  \ottnt{v_{{\mathrm{1}}}} \,  !\!\!==  \, \ottnt{v_{{\mathrm{2}}}} ,  \ottnt{s}  \rangle  \rightarrow  \langle  \ottnt{b} ,  \ottnt{s}  \rangle }{%
{\ottdrulename{OpNEqEq}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleBoolNeg}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{ !\!  \, \ottnt{b_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{=}  \ottnt{b_{{\mathrm{2}}}}}%
}{
 \langle   !\!  \, \ottnt{b_{{\mathrm{1}}}} ,  \ottnt{s}  \rangle  \rightarrow  \langle  \ottnt{b_{{\mathrm{2}}}} ,  \ottnt{s}  \rangle }{%
{\ottdrulename{BoolNeg}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleNumNeg}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{ -\!  \, \ottnt{n_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{=}  \ottnt{n}}%
}{
 \langle   -\!  \, \ottnt{n_{{\mathrm{1}}}} ,  \ottnt{s}  \rangle  \rightarrow  \langle  \ottnt{n} ,  \ottnt{s}  \rangle }{%
{\ottdrulename{NumNeg}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdrulePostInc}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\ottsym{get(}  \ottnt{s}  \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{id}  \ottsym{)} \, \ottsym{+} \, \ottsym{1}  \ottsym{=}  \ottnt{v}}%
}{
 \langle  \ottnt{id} \,  \!\!+\!\!+  ,  \ottnt{s}  \rangle  \rightarrow  \langle  \ottnt{id} ,  \ottsym{put(}  \ottnt{s}  \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{id}  \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{v}  \ottsym{)}  \rangle }{%
{\ottdrulename{PostInc}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdrulePreInc}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\ottsym{get(}  \ottnt{s}  \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{id}  \ottsym{)} \, \ottsym{+} \, \ottsym{1}  \ottsym{=}  \ottnt{v}}%
}{
 \langle   +\!\!+\!\!  \, \ottnt{id} ,  \ottnt{s}  \rangle  \rightarrow  \langle  \ottnt{id} \, \ottsym{+} \, \ottsym{1} ,  \ottsym{put(}  \ottnt{s}  \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{id}  \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{v}  \ottsym{)}  \rangle }{%
{\ottdrulename{PreInc}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdrulePostDec}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\ottsym{get(}  \ottnt{s}  \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{id}  \ottsym{)} \, \ottsym{-} \, \ottsym{1}  \ottsym{=}  \ottnt{v}}%
}{
 \langle  \ottnt{id} \,  \!\!\!-\!\!-  ,  \ottnt{s}  \rangle  \rightarrow  \langle  \ottnt{id} ,  \ottsym{put(}  \ottnt{s}  \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{id}  \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{v}  \ottsym{)}  \rangle }{%
{\ottdrulename{PostDec}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdrulePreDec}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\ottsym{get(}  \ottnt{s}  \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{id}  \ottsym{)} \, \ottsym{-} \, \ottsym{1}  \ottsym{=}  \ottnt{v}}%
}{
 \langle   -\!\!-\!\!  \, \ottnt{id} ,  \ottnt{s}  \rangle  \rightarrow  \langle  \ottnt{id} \, \ottsym{+} \, \ottsym{1} ,  \ottsym{put(}  \ottnt{s}  \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{id}  \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{v}  \ottsym{)}  \rangle }{%
{\ottdrulename{PreDec}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleIfOne}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{ \langle  \ottnt{e} ,  \ottnt{s}  \rangle  \rightarrow  \langle  \ottnt{e'} ,  \ottnt{s'}  \rangle }%
}{
 \langle  \ottkw{if} \, \ottsym{(}  \ottnt{e}  \ottsym{)}  \ottsym{\{}  \ottnt{m_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{\}} \, \ottkw{else} \, \ottsym{\{}  \ottnt{m_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \ottsym{\}} ,  \ottnt{s}  \rangle  \rightarrow  \langle  \ottkw{if} \, \ottsym{(}  \ottnt{e'}  \ottsym{)}  \ottsym{\{}  \ottnt{m_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{\}} \, \ottkw{else} \, \ottsym{\{}  \ottnt{m_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \ottsym{\}} ,  \ottnt{s'}  \rangle }{%
{\ottdrulename{If1}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleIfTwo}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
}{
 \langle  \ottkw{if} \, \ottsym{(}  \ottkw{true}  \ottsym{)}  \ottsym{\{}  \ottnt{m_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{\}} \, \ottkw{else} \, \ottsym{\{}  \ottnt{m_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \ottsym{\}} ,  \ottnt{s}  \rangle  \rightarrow  \langle  \ottnt{m_{{\mathrm{1}}}} ,  \ottnt{s}  \rangle }{%
{\ottdrulename{If2}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleIfThree}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
}{
 \langle  \ottkw{if} \, \ottsym{(}  \ottkw{false}  \ottsym{)}  \ottsym{\{}  \ottnt{m_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{\}} \, \ottkw{else} \, \ottsym{\{}  \ottnt{m_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \ottsym{\}} ,  \ottnt{s}  \rangle  \rightarrow  \langle  \ottnt{m_{{\mathrm{2}}}} ,  \ottnt{s}  \rangle }{%
{\ottdrulename{If3}}{}%
}}

\newcommand{\ottdefnreduce}[1]{\begin{ottdefnblock}[#1]{$ \langle  \ottnt{m} ,  \ottnt{s}  \rangle  \rightarrow  \langle  \ottnt{m'} ,  \ottnt{s'}  \rangle $}{}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleSeqOne{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleSeqTwo{}}

\ottusedrule{\ottdruleUnOpTwo{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleBinOpOne{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleBinOpTwo{}}

\newcommand{\ottdrulevXXnum}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
}{
 \Gamma   \vdash   \ottnt{n}  :  \ottkw{number} \hspace{5pt}| _{  \varnothing  } \hspace{3pt} \varnothing ,  \Gamma }{%
{\ottdrulename{v\_num}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdrulevXXbool}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
}{
 \Gamma   \vdash   \ottnt{b}  :  \ottkw{boolean} \hspace{5pt}| _{  \varnothing  } \hspace{3pt} \varnothing ,  \Gamma }{%
{\ottdrulename{v\_bool}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdrulevXXstring}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
}{
 \Gamma   \vdash   \ottkw{str}  :  \ottkw{string} \hspace{5pt}| _{  \varnothing  } \hspace{3pt} \varnothing ,  \Gamma }{%
{\ottdrulename{v\_string}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdrulevXXundefined}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
}{
 \Gamma   \vdash   \ottkw{undefined}  :  \ottkw{undefined} \hspace{5pt}| _{  \varnothing  } \hspace{3pt} \varnothing ,  \Gamma }{%
{\ottdrulename{v\_undefined}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdrulevXXull}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
}{
 \Gamma   \vdash   \ottkw{null}  :  \ottkw{null} \hspace{5pt}| _{  \varnothing  } \hspace{3pt} \varnothing ,  \Gamma }{%
{\ottdrulename{v\_ull}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleVXXSkip}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
}{
 \Gamma   \vdash    \epsilon   :  \ottkw{undefined} \hspace{5pt}| _{  \varnothing  } \hspace{3pt} \varnothing ,  \Gamma }{%
{\ottdrulename{V\_Skip}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleIdType}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\Gamma  \ottsym{(}  \ottnt{id}  \ottsym{)}  \ottsym{=}  \ottnt{T}}%
}{
 \Gamma   \vdash   \ottnt{id}  :  \ottnt{T} \hspace{5pt}| _{  \varnothing  } \hspace{3pt} \varnothing ,  \Gamma }{%
{\ottdrulename{IdType}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleIdTypeUndef}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\ottnt{id} \,  \notin  \, \ottsym{dom(}  \Gamma  \ottsym{)}}%
}{
 \Gamma   \vdash   \ottnt{id}  :  \ottnt{T} \hspace{5pt}| _{  \ottsym{\{}  \ottnt{T}  \ottsym{\}}  } \hspace{3pt} \varnothing ,   \Gamma  \cup  \ottsym{\{}  \ottnt{id}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{T}  \ottsym{\}}  }{%
{\ottdrulename{IdTypeUndef}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleAssignType}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{ \Gamma   \vdash   \ottnt{e}  :  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{1}}}} \hspace{5pt}| _{  \ottnt{X_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  } \hspace{3pt} \ottnt{C_{{\mathrm{1}}}} ,  \Gamma_{{\mathrm{1}}} }%
\ottpremise{ \Gamma_{{\mathrm{1}}}   \vdash   \ottnt{id}  :  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{2}}}} \hspace{5pt}| _{  \ottnt{X_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  } \hspace{3pt} \ottnt{C_{{\mathrm{2}}}} ,  \Gamma_{{\mathrm{2}}} }%
\ottpremise{ \ottnt{X_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \cap  \ottnt{X_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \, \ottsym{=} \, \varnothing}%
}{
 \Gamma   \vdash   \ottnt{id} \, \ottsym{=} \, \ottnt{e}  :  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{2}}}} \hspace{5pt}| _{   \ottnt{X_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \cup  \ottnt{X_{{\mathrm{2}}}}   } \hspace{3pt}    \ottnt{C_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \cup  \ottnt{C_{{\mathrm{2}}}}    \cup  \ottsym{\{}  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{2}}}} \, \ottsym{=} \, \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{\}}  ,  \Gamma_{{\mathrm{2}}} }{%
{\ottdrulename{AssignType}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdrulePlusAssignType}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{ \Gamma   \vdash   \ottnt{e}  :  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{1}}}} \hspace{5pt}| _{  \ottnt{X_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  } \hspace{3pt} \ottnt{C_{{\mathrm{1}}}} ,  \Gamma_{{\mathrm{1}}} }%
\ottpremise{ \Gamma_{{\mathrm{1}}}   \vdash   \ottnt{id}  :  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{2}}}} \hspace{5pt}| _{  \ottnt{X_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  } \hspace{3pt} \ottnt{C_{{\mathrm{2}}}} ,  \Gamma_{{\mathrm{2}}} }%
\ottpremise{ \ottnt{X_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \cap  \ottnt{X_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \, \ottsym{=} \, \varnothing}%
}{
 \Gamma   \vdash   \ottnt{id} \,  +\!=  \, \ottnt{e}  :  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{2}}}} \hspace{5pt}| _{   \ottnt{X_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \cup  \ottnt{X_{{\mathrm{2}}}}   } \hspace{3pt}    \ottnt{C_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \cup  \ottnt{C_{{\mathrm{2}}}}    \cup    \ottsym{\{}  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{2}}}} \, \ottsym{=} \, \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{\}}  \cup  \ottsym{\{}  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{1}}}} \, \ottsym{=} \, \ottkw{number}  \ottsym{\}}    ,  \Gamma_{{\mathrm{2}}} }{%
{\ottdrulename{PlusAssignType}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleMinusAssignType}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{ \Gamma   \vdash   \ottnt{e}  :  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{1}}}} \hspace{5pt}| _{  \ottnt{X_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  } \hspace{3pt} \ottnt{C_{{\mathrm{1}}}} ,  \Gamma_{{\mathrm{1}}} }%
\ottpremise{ \Gamma_{{\mathrm{1}}}   \vdash   \ottnt{id}  :  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{2}}}} \hspace{5pt}| _{  \ottnt{X_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  } \hspace{3pt} \ottnt{C_{{\mathrm{2}}}} ,  \Gamma_{{\mathrm{2}}} }%
\ottpremise{ \ottnt{X_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \cap  \ottnt{X_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \, \ottsym{=} \, \varnothing}%
}{
 \Gamma   \vdash   \ottnt{id} \,  -\!\!=  \, \ottnt{e}  :  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{2}}}} \hspace{5pt}| _{   \ottnt{X_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \cup  \ottnt{X_{{\mathrm{2}}}}   } \hspace{3pt}    \ottnt{C_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \cup  \ottnt{C_{{\mathrm{2}}}}    \cup    \ottsym{\{}  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{2}}}} \, \ottsym{=} \, \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{\}}  \cup  \ottsym{\{}  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{1}}}} \, \ottsym{=} \, \ottkw{number}  \ottsym{\}}    ,  \Gamma_{{\mathrm{2}}} }{%
{\ottdrulename{MinusAssignType}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleTimesAssignType}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{ \Gamma   \vdash   \ottnt{e}  :  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{1}}}} \hspace{5pt}| _{  \ottnt{X_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  } \hspace{3pt} \ottnt{C_{{\mathrm{1}}}} ,  \Gamma_{{\mathrm{1}}} }%
\ottpremise{ \Gamma_{{\mathrm{1}}}   \vdash   \ottnt{id}  :  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{2}}}} \hspace{5pt}| _{  \ottnt{X_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  } \hspace{3pt} \ottnt{C_{{\mathrm{2}}}} ,  \Gamma_{{\mathrm{2}}} }%
\ottpremise{ \ottnt{X_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \cap  \ottnt{X_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \, \ottsym{=} \, \varnothing}%
}{
 \Gamma   \vdash   \ottnt{id} \,  *\!=  \, \ottnt{e}  :  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{2}}}} \hspace{5pt}| _{   \ottnt{X_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \cup  \ottnt{X_{{\mathrm{2}}}}   } \hspace{3pt}    \ottnt{C_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \cup  \ottnt{C_{{\mathrm{2}}}}    \cup    \ottsym{\{}  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{2}}}} \, \ottsym{=} \, \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{\}}  \cup  \ottsym{\{}  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{1}}}} \, \ottsym{=} \, \ottkw{number}  \ottsym{\}}    ,  \Gamma_{{\mathrm{2}}} }{%
{\ottdrulename{TimesAssignType}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleDivAssignType}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{ \Gamma   \vdash   \ottnt{e}  :  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{1}}}} \hspace{5pt}| _{  \ottnt{X_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  } \hspace{3pt} \ottnt{C_{{\mathrm{1}}}} ,  \Gamma_{{\mathrm{1}}} }%
\ottpremise{ \Gamma_{{\mathrm{1}}}   \vdash   \ottnt{id}  :  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{2}}}} \hspace{5pt}| _{  \ottnt{X_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  } \hspace{3pt} \ottnt{C_{{\mathrm{2}}}} ,  \Gamma_{{\mathrm{2}}} }%
\ottpremise{ \ottnt{X_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \cap  \ottnt{X_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \, \ottsym{=} \, \varnothing}%
}{
 \Gamma   \vdash   \ottnt{id} \,  /\!\!=  \, \ottnt{e}  :  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{2}}}} \hspace{5pt}| _{   \ottnt{X_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \cup  \ottnt{X_{{\mathrm{2}}}}   } \hspace{3pt}    \ottnt{C_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \cup  \ottnt{C_{{\mathrm{2}}}}    \cup    \ottsym{\{}  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{2}}}} \, \ottsym{=} \, \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{\}}  \cup  \ottsym{\{}  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{1}}}} \, \ottsym{=} \, \ottkw{number}  \ottsym{\}}    ,  \Gamma_{{\mathrm{2}}} }{%
{\ottdrulename{DivAssignType}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleModAssignType}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{ \Gamma   \vdash   \ottnt{e}  :  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{1}}}} \hspace{5pt}| _{  \ottnt{X_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  } \hspace{3pt} \ottnt{C_{{\mathrm{1}}}} ,  \Gamma_{{\mathrm{1}}} }%
\ottpremise{ \Gamma_{{\mathrm{1}}}   \vdash   \ottnt{id}  :  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{2}}}} \hspace{5pt}| _{  \ottnt{X_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  } \hspace{3pt} \ottnt{C_{{\mathrm{2}}}} ,  \Gamma_{{\mathrm{2}}} }%
\ottpremise{ \ottnt{X_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \cap  \ottnt{X_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \, \ottsym{=} \, \varnothing}%
}{
 \Gamma   \vdash   \ottnt{id} \,  \%\!=  \, \ottnt{e}  :  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{2}}}} \hspace{5pt}| _{   \ottnt{X_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \cup  \ottnt{X_{{\mathrm{2}}}}   } \hspace{3pt}    \ottnt{C_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \cup  \ottnt{C_{{\mathrm{2}}}}    \cup    \ottsym{\{}  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{2}}}} \, \ottsym{=} \, \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{\}}  \cup  \ottsym{\{}  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{1}}}} \, \ottsym{=} \, \ottkw{number}  \ottsym{\}}    ,  \Gamma_{{\mathrm{2}}} }{%
{\ottdrulename{ModAssignType}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleAddType}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{ \Gamma   \vdash   \ottnt{e_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  :  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{1}}}} \hspace{5pt}| _{  \ottnt{X_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  } \hspace{3pt} \ottnt{C_{{\mathrm{1}}}} ,  \Gamma_{{\mathrm{1}}} }%
\ottpremise{ \Gamma_{{\mathrm{1}}}   \vdash   \ottnt{e_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  :  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{2}}}} \hspace{5pt}| _{  \ottnt{X_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  } \hspace{3pt} \ottnt{C_{{\mathrm{2}}}} ,  \Gamma_{{\mathrm{2}}} }%
\ottpremise{ \ottnt{X_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \cap  \ottnt{X_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \, \ottsym{=} \, \varnothing}%
}{
 \Gamma   \vdash   \ottnt{e_{{\mathrm{1}}}} \, \ottsym{+} \, \ottnt{e_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  :  \ottkw{number} \hspace{5pt}| _{   \ottnt{X_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \cup  \ottnt{X_{{\mathrm{2}}}}   } \hspace{3pt}    \ottnt{C_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \cup  \ottnt{C_{{\mathrm{2}}}}    \cup    \ottsym{\{}  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{1}}}} \, \ottsym{=} \, \ottkw{number}  \ottsym{\}}  \cup  \ottsym{\{}  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{2}}}} \, \ottsym{=} \, \ottkw{number}  \ottsym{\}}    ,  \Gamma_{{\mathrm{2}}} }{%
{\ottdrulename{AddType}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleSubtractType}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{ \Gamma   \vdash   \ottnt{e_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  :  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{1}}}} \hspace{5pt}| _{  \ottnt{X_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  } \hspace{3pt} \ottnt{C_{{\mathrm{1}}}} ,  \Gamma_{{\mathrm{1}}} }%
\ottpremise{ \Gamma_{{\mathrm{1}}}   \vdash   \ottnt{e_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  :  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{2}}}} \hspace{5pt}| _{  \ottnt{X_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  } \hspace{3pt} \ottnt{C_{{\mathrm{2}}}} ,  \Gamma_{{\mathrm{2}}} }%
\ottpremise{ \ottnt{X_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \cap  \ottnt{X_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \, \ottsym{=} \, \varnothing}%
}{
 \Gamma   \vdash   \ottnt{e_{{\mathrm{1}}}} \, \ottsym{-} \, \ottnt{e_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  :  \ottkw{number} \hspace{5pt}| _{   \ottnt{X_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \cup  \ottnt{X_{{\mathrm{2}}}}   } \hspace{3pt}    \ottnt{C_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \cup  \ottnt{C_{{\mathrm{2}}}}    \cup    \ottsym{\{}  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{1}}}} \, \ottsym{=} \, \ottkw{number}  \ottsym{\}}  \cup  \ottsym{\{}  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{2}}}} \, \ottsym{=} \, \ottkw{number}  \ottsym{\}}    ,  \Gamma_{{\mathrm{2}}} }{%
{\ottdrulename{SubtractType}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleMultType}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{ \Gamma   \vdash   \ottnt{e_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  :  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{1}}}} \hspace{5pt}| _{  \ottnt{X_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  } \hspace{3pt} \ottnt{C_{{\mathrm{1}}}} ,  \Gamma_{{\mathrm{1}}} }%
\ottpremise{ \Gamma_{{\mathrm{1}}}   \vdash   \ottnt{e_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  :  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{2}}}} \hspace{5pt}| _{  \ottnt{X_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  } \hspace{3pt} \ottnt{C_{{\mathrm{2}}}} ,  \Gamma_{{\mathrm{2}}} }%
\ottpremise{ \ottnt{X_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \cap  \ottnt{X_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \, \ottsym{=} \, \varnothing}%
}{
 \Gamma   \vdash   \ottnt{e_{{\mathrm{1}}}} \, \ottsym{*} \, \ottnt{e_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  :  \ottkw{number} \hspace{5pt}| _{   \ottnt{X_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \cup  \ottnt{X_{{\mathrm{2}}}}   } \hspace{3pt}    \ottnt{C_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \cup  \ottnt{C_{{\mathrm{2}}}}    \cup    \ottsym{\{}  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{1}}}} \, \ottsym{=} \, \ottkw{number}  \ottsym{\}}  \cup  \ottsym{\{}  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{2}}}} \, \ottsym{=} \, \ottkw{number}  \ottsym{\}}    ,  \Gamma_{{\mathrm{2}}} }{%
{\ottdrulename{MultType}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleDivType}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%

\newcommand{\ottdruleOrType}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%

\newcommand{\ottdruleLessType}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%

\newcommand{\ottdruleBoolNegType}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%

%% defn typable
\newcommand{\ottdruleDecTypable}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
}{
 \Gamma   \vdash   \ottkw{var} \, \ottnt{id}  \hspace{5pt}| _{  \ottsym{\{}  \ottnt{T}  \ottsym{\}}  } \hspace{3pt} \varnothing ,   \Gamma  \cup  \ottsym{\{}  \ottnt{id}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{T}  \ottsym{\}}  }{%
{\ottdrulename{DecTypable}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleExpTypable}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{ \Gamma   \vdash   \ottnt{e}  :  \ottnt{T} \hspace{5pt}| _{  \ottnt{X}  } \hspace{3pt} \ottnt{C} ,  \Gamma' }%
}{
 \Gamma   \vdash   \ottnt{e}  \hspace{5pt}| _{  \ottnt{X}  } \hspace{3pt} \ottnt{C} ,  \Gamma' }{%
{\ottdrulename{ExpTypable}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleSeqTypable}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{ \Gamma   \vdash   \ottnt{m_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \hspace{5pt}| _{  \ottnt{X_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  } \hspace{3pt} \ottnt{C_{{\mathrm{1}}}} ,  \Gamma_{{\mathrm{1}}} }%
\ottpremise{ \Gamma_{{\mathrm{1}}}   \vdash   \ottnt{m_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \hspace{5pt}| _{  \ottnt{X_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  } \hspace{3pt} \ottnt{C_{{\mathrm{2}}}} ,  \Gamma_{{\mathrm{2}}} }%
\ottpremise{ \ottnt{X_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \cap  \ottnt{X_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \, \ottsym{=} \, \varnothing}%
}{
 \Gamma   \vdash   \ottnt{m_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{;}  \ottnt{m_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \hspace{5pt}| _{   \ottnt{X_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \cup  \ottnt{X_{{\mathrm{2}}}}   } \hspace{3pt}  \ottnt{C_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \cup  \ottnt{C_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  ,  \Gamma_{{\mathrm{2}}} }{%
{\ottdrulename{SeqTypable}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleIfTypable}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{ \Gamma   \vdash   \ottnt{e}  :  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{1}}}} \hspace{5pt}| _{  \ottnt{X_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  } \hspace{3pt} \ottnt{C_{{\mathrm{1}}}} ,  \Gamma_{{\mathrm{1}}} }%
\ottpremise{ \Gamma_{{\mathrm{1}}}   \vdash   \ottnt{m_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \hspace{5pt}| _{  \ottnt{X_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  } \hspace{3pt} \ottnt{C_{{\mathrm{2}}}} ,  \Gamma_{{\mathrm{2}}} }%
\ottpremise{ \Gamma_{{\mathrm{1}}}   \vdash   \ottnt{m_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \hspace{5pt}| _{  \ottnt{X_{{\mathrm{3}}}}  } \hspace{3pt} \ottnt{C_{{\mathrm{3}}}} ,  \Gamma_{{\mathrm{3}}} }%
\ottpremise{ \ottnt{X_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \cap  \ottnt{X_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \, \ottsym{=} \, \varnothing}%
}{
 \Gamma   \vdash   \ottkw{if} \, \ottsym{(}  \ottnt{e}  \ottsym{)}  \ottsym{\{}  \ottnt{m_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{\}} \, \ottkw{else} \, \ottsym{\{}  \ottnt{m_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \ottsym{\}}  \hspace{5pt}| _{     \ottnt{X_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \cup  \ottnt{X_{{\mathrm{2}}}}    \cup  \ottnt{X_{{\mathrm{3}}}}   } \hspace{3pt}    \ottnt{C_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \cup    \ottnt{C_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \cup  \ottnt{C_{{\mathrm{3}}}}      \cup  \ottsym{\{}  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{1}}}} \, \ottsym{=} \, \ottkw{boolean}  \ottsym{\}}  ,  \Gamma_{{\mathrm{1}}} }{%
{\ottdrulename{IfTypable}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleDefTypable}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{ \Gamma   \vdash   \ottkw{var} \, \ottnt{id}  \hspace{5pt}| _{  \ottnt{X_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  } \hspace{3pt} \ottnt{C} ,  \Gamma_{{\mathrm{1}}} }%
\ottpremise{ \Gamma_{{\mathrm{1}}}   \vdash   \ottnt{id} \, \ottsym{=} \, \ottnt{e}  :  \ottnt{T} \hspace{5pt}| _{  \ottnt{X_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  } \hspace{3pt} \ottnt{C} ,  \Gamma_{{\mathrm{2}}} }%
\ottpremise{ \ottnt{X_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \cap  \ottnt{X_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \, \ottsym{=} \, \varnothing}%
}{
 \Gamma   \vdash   \ottkw{var} \, \ottnt{id}  \ottsym{=}  \ottnt{e}  \hspace{5pt}| _{   \ottnt{X_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \cup  \ottnt{X_{{\mathrm{2}}}}   } \hspace{3pt}  \ottnt{C_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \cup  \ottnt{C_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  ,  \Gamma_{{\mathrm{2}}} }{%
{\ottdrulename{DefTypable}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleMultiDecTypable}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{ \Gamma   \vdash   \ottkw{var} \, \ottnt{vd}  \hspace{5pt}| _{  \ottnt{X_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  } \hspace{3pt} \ottnt{C_{{\mathrm{1}}}} ,  \Gamma_{{\mathrm{1}}} }%
\ottpremise{ \Gamma_{{\mathrm{1}}}   \vdash   \ottkw{var} \, \ottnt{vd'}  \hspace{5pt}| _{  \ottnt{X_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  } \hspace{3pt} \ottnt{C_{{\mathrm{2}}}} ,  \Gamma_{{\mathrm{2}}} }%
\ottpremise{ \ottnt{X_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \cap  \ottnt{X_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \, \ottsym{=} \, \varnothing}%
}{
 \Gamma   \vdash   \ottkw{var} \, \ottnt{vd}  \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{vd'}  \hspace{5pt}| _{   \ottnt{X_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \cup  \ottnt{X_{{\mathrm{2}}}}   } \hspace{3pt}  \ottnt{C_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \cup  \ottnt{C_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  ,  \Gamma_{{\mathrm{2}}} }{%
{\ottdrulename{MultiDecTypable}}{}%
}}

\newcommand{\ottdefntypable}[1]{\begin{ottdefnblock}[#1]{$ \Gamma   \vdash   \ottnt{m}  \hspace{5pt}| _{  \ottnt{X}  } \hspace{3pt} \ottnt{C} ,  \Gamma' $}{}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleDecTypable{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleExpTypable{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleSeqTypable{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleIfTypable{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleDefTypable{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleMultiDecTypable{}}
\end{ottdefnblock}}


\newcommand{\ottdefnsJop}{
\ottdefnmaths{}\ottdefnexpTypeTwo{}\ottdefnConstraintEq{}\ottdefnreduce{}\ottdefnexpType{}\ottdefntypable{}}

\newcommand{\ottdefnss}{
\ottdefnsJop
}

\ottgrammar\\[5.0mm]
\ottdefnss}
